```{python}
import pandas as pd

skills_data = {
    "Name": ["Bingrui Qiao", "Zhengyu Zhou", "Junhao Wang"],
    "Python": [2, 2, 3],
    "SQL": [2, 2, 3],
    "Machine Learning": [1, 1, 1],
    "Cloud Computing": [2, 2, 3]
}

df_skills = pd.DataFrame(skills_data)
df_skills.set_index("Name", inplace=True)
df_skills
```
